skillTree.name: Barded Nightmare
skillTree.description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

skillTree.name: Hellsteed
skillTree.description: "To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!"

skillTree.name: Queen Bee
skillTree.description: "Who's queen? That's right… Now, prostrate yourself before me, worm!"

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -50%
	(Heroes in local region)

Hero action success chance: +50%
	(Heroes in local region)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -25%
	(Heroes in local region)

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Midnight's Children
skillTree.description: Evil takes flight; blotting out the moon on blackened wings, calling us to the dance…

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
	(own army)

Melee attack: +8 for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
	(own army)

skillTree.name: At Dawn They Sleep
skillTree.description: Nocturnal spectres hiding from the light, addicted to your blood.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Dire Wolves and Fell Bats units
	(own army)

Passive ability: "The Hunger" for Dire Wolves and Fell Bats units
	(own army)

skillTree.name: Court of Blood
skillTree.description: Even in Undeath, every queen needs loyal retainers and handmaidens.

skillTree.name: The Ravening Beast
skillTree.description: The darkness within us all, given free rein to lust and gorge eternally.

skillTree.name: Storm of the Night
skillTree.description: "Come, my night-shape servants, we have a great work ahead of us."

skillTree.name: Time of Arising
skillTree.description: “Rise, my friends, rise. Flesh and blood has its place, but spirit is the prize valued above all other.”

effects.description:
Speed: +30% for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
	(own army)

Passive ability: "Wayfarer" for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
	(own army)

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Dark Knight
skillTree.description: "See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."

skillTree.name: Beguile
skillTree.description: "Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"

skillTree.name: Quickblood
skillTree.description: The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike hard, strike true.

skillTree.name: Curse of the Revenant
skillTree.description: The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Penumbral Pendulum"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Raise Dead" and "Raise Dead Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Skeleton Warriors

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15% for "Raise Dead Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wind of Death"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Retinue
backgroundSkills.description: The Undead whole is always stronger than the sum of its parts.

effects.description: Battle healing cap: +50% when in an army with Vlad von Carstein

Melee attack: +10 for embedded Vampire Heroes
	(own army)

Melee defence: +10 for embedded Vampire Heroes
	(own army)
